value.stringValue: [Action Required, Deadline - June 30th] Habyt Community Portal & Digital Payment System

Flow.description: Profile Update - Habyt Community Portal & Digital Payment System
Flow.label: Roomie Mass Email enANDit

start.filterLogic: 1 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4)

textTemplates.name: RichTextBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear community,

We’re excited to have you with us! 

As the last stage of welcoming you to the Habyt Community, we wanted to share the final instructions of the onboarding onto the two following systems:

  • the Habyt Community Portal 
  • the Digital Payment System

Here is what you have to do within the 30th of June 2022:

  1. Register on the Habyt website - Visit habyt.com/login to register on the Habyt Community Portal. This will trigger an email to your inbox (see next step). Please make sure you use the same email you received this information on. 
  2. Log into the Portal - Access your email inbox, click the direct link you received, and your new profile on the Habyt portal will open right away. No need to remember complex passwords anymore!
  3. Add Payment Details - On the portal, follow the instructions on the screen and enter your preferred payment method.
  4. Explore the Portal - You can manage your settings such as changing your payment details and getting in touch with us for any question you might have.

Please note:

  1. It is very important that you complete this process by the 30th of June so that your rent will be correctly charged via the system from your move-in date. 
  2. All future payments will take place through SEPA direct debit or credit card. There will be no additional charges to your account. For the security of your information, you can always visit our Privacy Policy page.
  3. Your rent payments will be hassle-free and will require no action on your side. You don’t need to send a bank transfer, as the rent will be automatically charged through the system, as a subscription, on the first day of every month. For us to process your payment successfully, please ensure that you have enough funds / a daily allowance and that the deduction is authorized.

You will be able to reach our support team from the Habyt portal. 

We remain available for all your questions about this topic, so don’t hesitate to reach out.


All the best

Your Habyt team

textTemplates.name: SE
textTemplates.text:
Dear Habyt community,


We’re excited to have you with us! 


(please scroll below for the Italian translation)


As you know, Roomie is now part of Habyt, and, as the last stage of welcoming you to the Habyt Community, we wanted to share the final instructions of the onboarding onto the two following systems:

  • the Habyt Community Portal 
  • the New Digital Payment System

 

While your contract does not change, and all the rental conditions remain the same, we ask you to update your payment details, in order to provide you with full access to the portal’s functionality - submit support requests directly to the Habyt Support Team, and pay your monthly rent. 


Here is how it works:

  1. Register - Visit habyt.com/login to register on the Habyt Community Portal, simply enter the email address you used to sign up with Roomie
  2. Login - To access your personal profile, click the direct link you will receive in your mailbox, and your profile will open right away. No need to remember complex passwords anymore!
  3. Add Payment Details - On the profile page, follow the instructions on the screen and enter your preferred payment method.
  4. Explore the Portal - You can manage your settings such as changing your payment details and getting in touch with us, raising tickets via this platform.



Please note, that all future payments will take place through SEPA direct debit or credit card. There will be no additional charges to your account and your rental fees will continue to be the same.

For the security of your information, you can always visit our Privacy Policy  page.


Your rent payments from July 1st onwards will be hassle-free and will require no action on your side. You don’t need to send a bank transfer, as the rent will be automatically charged through this system, as a subscription, on the first day of every month. For us to process your payment successfully please ensure that you have enough funds or a daily allowance and that the deduction is authorized.


We encourage you to share the news with your flatmates and check if they have also read this information. 


Note, that the Roomie website, as well as the contact e-mail addresses, have ceased to operate from May 17, 2022. The office telephone number will also be deactivated starting from June 10th and will remain active only for emergency calls. 


You will be able to reach our support team by sending an email to "support@habyt.com".

We remain available for all your questions about this topic, so don’t hesitate to reach out.


All the best

Your Habyt team




Gentile Inquilino,



Come sai, Roomie ora fa parte di Habyt e come ultima fase per diventare a tutti gli effetti un membro di questa nuova community, vogliamo condividere con te le istruzioni finali per l’integrazione su:

  • il Portale della Comunità Habyt
  • il Nuovo Sistema di Pagamento Digitale



Sebbene il tuo contratto non cambi e tutte le condizioni di affitto rimangano invariate, ti chiediamo di aggiornare i tuoi dati fiscali, in questo modo avrai pieno accesso alle funzionalità del portale: potrai inviare richieste di supporto direttamente al Team di supporto Habyt e pagare il tuo affitto mensile.


Ecco come funziona:

  1. Registrati - Visita habyt.com/login per registrarti sul portale della community Habyt, inserisci semplicemente l'indirizzo email che utilizzi per metterti in contatto con Roomie.
  2. Login - Per accedere al tuo profilo personale, clicca sul link diretto che riceverai nella tua casella di posta e il tuo profilo si aprirà subito senza ulteriori complicazioni. 
  3. Aggiungi dettagli di pagamento - Nella pagina del profilo, segui le istruzioni e inserisci il metodo di pagamento preferito.
  4. Esplora il Portale - Puoi gestire le tue impostazioni, modificare i dettagli di pagamento, metterti in contatto con noi inserendo i ticket e mandando le richieste di assistenza tramite questa piattaforma.



Si prega di notare che tutti i pagamenti futuri avverranno tramite addebito diretto su carta di credito o debito. Non ci saranno costi aggiuntivi sul tuo account e i tuoi canoni di affitto continueranno a essere gli stessi.

Per verificare e modificare le tue informazioni personali, puoi sempre consultare la nostra pagina sulla Privacy Policy.


I pagamenti dell'affitto dal 1° luglio in poi saranno semplici e non richiederanno alcuna azione da parte tua. L'affitto verrà addebitato automaticamente attraverso questo sistema, come un abbonamento, il primo giorno di ogni mese. Affinché possiamo elaborare correttamente il tuo pagamento, assicurati sempre di disporre di fondi sufficienti e che la detrazione sia autorizzata.


Ti invitiamo a condividere queste informazioni con i tuoi coinquilini per verificare se anche loro hanno letto questa mail.


Vogliamo informarvi inoltre che a partire dal 10 Giugno 2022 il telefono dell’ufficio verrà disattivato, ma rimarrà comunque attivo per le emergenze.

Non preoccupatevi, potrete sempre contattare il nostro team di assistenza clienti inviando un'e-mail a support@habyt.com. 


Rimaniamo a disposizione per eventuali domande o dubbi, non esitare a contattarci.


Cordiali saluti, 


Il Team di Habyt
